title: Introduction to BPO
content: This section covers the basics of Business Process Outsourcing (BPO), its benefits, and common types of BPO services.

title: Setting Up Your BPO Business
content: Learn about the essential steps to establish your BPO company, including legal registration, infrastructure, and initial team building.

title: Client Acquisition Strategies
content: Explore effective strategies for identifying, approaching, and securing new clients for your BPO services.

title: Maintaining Client Relationships
content: Best practices for fostering long-term relationships with your clients, ensuring satisfaction and repeat business.

title: Expanding Your Operations
content: Guidance on how to scale your BPO business, including expanding services, hiring more staff, and entering new markets.
